content.html: They definitely did die from a psycho. But what do the majority of civilian-based mass killing events in America have in common…? A gun. What do other countries not have because they have strict gun laws? They don’t have 200+ civilian-based mass killing events done by guns.
content.value:
They definitely did die from a psycho. But what do the majority of civilian-based mass killing events in America have in common…? A gun.  

What do other countries not have because they have strict gun laws? They don’t have 200+ civilian-based mass killing events done by guns.
